unidue.ub.statistics.media.journal

Class JournalCollectionDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • unidue.ub.statistics.media.journal.JournalCollectionDAO

  • public class JournalCollectionDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods to retrieve, delete and persist JournalCollection objects.
    Author:
    Eike Spielberg
